Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Grand. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Grand.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #39 Pershing Temporary Reroute at 39th/Kedzie
ShortDescription: 39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted via 39th, Kedzie, 38th, California, and 39th due to, street blockage near 39th/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted via 39th, Kedzie, 38th, California, and 39th due to, street blockage near 39th/Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.
